title: Unhappy Festivus!
sub_head: Is one day enough to air all our grievances about federal spending?
body:
Today brings an especially challenging holiday for many Americans. Much as we enjoy letting others know how they have disappointed us, this year’s passing of “Seinfeld” actor Jerry Stiller makes for an especially bittersweet Festivus.
Fortunately, Sen. Rand Paul (R., Ky.) is doing his part to maintain the traditional airing of grievances. And he is rightly focused on the waste, fraud and abuse perpetrated by his fellow politicians. Put simply, he’s got a lot of problems with those people. Writes Sen.
